name: Viral Change
description:
A top down game where you play as a virus trying to go through everyday life without infecting anyone. Your goal is to collect regular things in an attempt to make the virus feel like a person. Includes 3 levels along with an endless mode.

Warning: I have never personally tried the mac version as I have a windows computer. The windows one is the official release, I included the mac build in case any mac users wanted to try it :)

The team:

Chaim Gersten: Ideas and playtesting

Nathan Goren: Game development in Unity

Elly Honig: Game development in Unity

Mordy Levy: Ideas

Nachum Twesrky: 3D Modeler

Dani Roth: Music

Eli Roth: Game development in Unity

Jon Welgrin: Dialogue
